keyword: how many calories in shrimp cocktail
title: How Many Calories in Shrimp Cocktail?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in shrimp cocktail for a standard serving, including protein, carbs, fat, sodium details, and preparation tweaks.
h1: How Many Calories in Shrimp Cocktail?
assumptions: Standard serving: 6 medium cooked shrimp (85 g) with 2 tbsp cocktail sauce; shrimp boiled, sauce tomato-based with horseradish.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by shrimp size, sauce brand, preparation method, and portion; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical serving of shrimp cocktail provides ~115 kcal and ~18 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp low-fat mayo to sauce
Use 8 large shrimp instead of 6 medium

faqs.q: How many calories in shrimp cocktail without sauce?
faqs.a: About 80 kcal for 6 medium shrimp alone.

faqs.q: Is shrimp cocktail high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, a standard serving has ~18 g protein.

faqs.q: What's the sodium content in shrimp cocktail?
faqs.a: Around 650 mg per serving, mostly from the sauce.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in shrimp cocktail?
faqs.a: About 8 g carbs per serving, primarily from the cocktail sauce.

faqs.q: How does preparation affect calories in shrimp cocktail?
faqs.a: Boiled shrimp is low-cal; fried or added oils increase it by 50+ kcal.
